text: Ram Trucks is an American brand of light-to-mid weight pickup trucks. The car brand started in 2009. It used to be called Dodge Truck Division. Ram Trucks is part of Chrysler, LLC. The Ram Trucks logo has the head of a ram. This logo was used by Dodge in the past. ==References== Category:Dodge automobiles Category:2009 establishments in the United States Category:Stellantis
title: Ram Trucks
